ValidationRule.description: For Deactivate Account Request Type, and Reason is '07-Duplicated-101' then require the Duplicated Account ID to be filled in
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( RecordType.Name == "Deactivate Account" , TEXT(Deactivate_Reason__c) == "07-Duplicated-101" , ISBLANK( Duplicated_Account_ID__c)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: (014) Please enter the Duplicated Account ID.
